name: engine.adaptFraction
description: Set to zero for disabling schedule adaptation

name: engine.doSwapFixedRefAndVariational
description: Out of 2 iterations, swap the target chains between the fixed-ref PT and variational PT

name: engine.fullyIndepFixedRef
description: For quick benchmarking, convenient to run both fixed ref and variational without them interacting at all.

name: engine.ladder
description: The annealing schedule to use or if adaptation is used, the initial value

name: engine.minSamplesForVariational
description: Use classical annealing until a certain number of samples is accumulated, then turn on one variational reference

name: engine.scmInit.maxAnnealingParameter
description: Use higher values for likelihood maximization

name: engine.scmInit.nFinalRejuvenations
description: Number of rejuvenation passes to do after the change of measure.

name: engine.scmInit.random
description: Random seed used for proposals and resampling.

name: engine.scmInit.recordWeights
description: Save log weights over iterations.

name: engine.scmInit.resamplingESSThreshold
description: If the (relative) Effective Sample Size (ESS) falls below, perform a resampling round.

name: engine.scmInit.temperatureSchedule
description: Algorithm selecting annealing parameter increments.

name: engine.scmInit.temperatureSchedule.absoluteAccuracy
description: The absolute accuracy for searching for next annealing parameter.

name: engine.scmInit.temperatureSchedule.nudgeFromZeroIfOutOfSupport
description: If all particles are out of support at first iteration, nudge the temperature a bit so that support constraints kick in.

name: engine.scmInit.temperatureSchedule.threshold
description: Annealing parameter is selected to get the (conditional) ESS decrease specified by this parameter.

name: engine.scmInit.temperatureSchedule.useConditional
description: See Zhou, Johansen and Aston (2013).

name: engine.statisticRecordedMaxChainIndex
description: Use when huge number of chains are utilized. Statistics like energy, logLikelihood are only recorded for the first so many indices to avoid excessive output size.

name: engine.thinning
description: Collect statistics every thinning iteration (=1 to always collect, >1 to save hard drive space)

name: engine.useFixedRefPT
description: In addition to a chain from variational distribution to target, use another chain based on classical annealing from prior

name: excludeFromOutput
type: List: Space separated items or "file <path>" to load from newline separated file

name: experimentConfigs.configFile
description: If set, use those arguments in provided file that do not appear in the provided arguments.

name: experimentConfigs.description
description: Documentation for this run.

name: experimentConfigs.managedExecutionFolder
description: Automatically organize results into subdirectories of 'results/all'?

name: experimentConfigs.maxIndentationToPrint
description: Use -1 to silence all output done through blang.System.*

name: experimentConfigs.recordExecutionInfo
description: Record information such as timing, main class, code version, etc for this run?

name: experimentConfigs.saveStandardStreams
description: Save combined standard out and err into a file?

name: model.counts.name
description: Name of variable in the plate

name: model.covariates.name
description: Name of variable in the plate

name: model.expectedCounts.name
description: Name of variable in the plate

name: model.spatialData.adjacency
description: Should be 1 indexed, will take care of translating.

name: model.spatialEffects.name
description: Name of variable in the plate

name: postProcessor.blangExecutionDirectory
description: When called from Blang, this will be the latest run, otherwise point to the .exec folder created by Blang

name: postProcessor.experimentConfigs.configFile
description: If set, use those arguments in provided file that do not appear in the provided arguments.

name: postProcessor.experimentConfigs.description
description: Documentation for this run.

name: postProcessor.experimentConfigs.managedExecutionFolder
description: Automatically organize results into subdirectories of 'results/all'?

name: postProcessor.experimentConfigs.maxIndentationToPrint
description: Use -1 to silence all output done through blang.System.*

name: postProcessor.experimentConfigs.recordExecutionInfo
description: Record information such as timing, main class, code version, etc for this run?

name: postProcessor.experimentConfigs.saveStandardStreams
description: Save combined standard out and err into a file?

name: samplers.additional
type: SamplerSet: Fully qualified instances of blang.mcmc.Sampler
description: Samplers to be added.

name: samplers.excluded
type: SamplerSet: Fully qualified instances of blang.mcmc.Sampler
description: Samplers to be excluded (only useful if useAnnotation = true).

name: samplers.useAnnotation
description: If the arguments of the annotations @Samplers should be used to determine a starting set of sampler types.

name: stripped
description: Stripped means that the construction of forward simulators and annealers is skipped
